Title: Kogda derevya byli bolshimi
Actors: Inna Gulaya, Yuriy Nikulin, Leonid Kuravlyov, Yekaterina Mazurova
Plot: The story of a man who routinely dodges all responsibility, bemoans fate, spends his days boozing, and refuses to work. The act of playing long-lost father to a pretty teenager spurs him to turn over a new leaf.
